## Document Hierarchy

```
Level 1 (Discovery)
├── SKILL.md - Feature overview
└── GETTING_STARTED.md - First 5 minutes

Level 2 (Practical)
├── scenarios/ - Workflow examples
│   ├── starting_work.md
│   ├── progress_update.md
│   ├── blocker_escalation.md
│   ├── handoff.md
│   └── sharing_evidence.md
├── TEMPLATES.md - Copy-paste ready
└── QUICK_REFERENCE.md - Commands, JQL, shortcuts

Level 3 (Advanced)
├── DEEP_DIVES/
│   ├── COMMENT_ETIQUETTE.md
│   ├── ATTACHMENT_STRATEGY.md
│   ├── NOTIFICATION_MANAGEMENT.md
│   ├── TEAM_COMMUNICATION.md
│   └── ACTIVITY_TRACKING.md
└── references/
    ├── SCRIPT_OPTIONS.md
    ├── COMMENT_FORMATS.md
    └── adf_guide.md
```
